name: A 4-Room Puzzle (simple game, practice for Inkjam)

description:
A 4-Room Puzzle (simple game, practice for Inkjam) is a game developed by noseflautist. It came out on 23-08-2022.
You can play A 4-Room Puzzle (simple game, practice for Inkjam) on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
